Articles.Content:
Hey, guys! I just recently thought it was a good idea to join the forums here! I've been playing KSP since around version 0.19 (I know, not that big of an achievement xD) and I'm really excited to share some of my spacecraft and screenshots! In fact, here's the Mun landing I did while writing this :

And that's my introduction! I hope to be seeing some of you guys around the forums!
Welcome to the Forums! Nice Mun landing! That reminds me of my first landing in the demo. Malbus Kerman never made it back though...

Welcome! Wait- since 0.19? I've only been playing since .23, I think.

What took you so long to get here?

Anyway, welcome!
Thanks! And I just never had the urge to really share any of my creations and my game until now.
